Advent Ritualized Instruction.description: Veteran adepts and anima telepathically share their memories of battle in ritual communion with new capital ship and titan crews, allowing them to start with experience.
Advent Ritualized Instruction.name: Ritualized Instruction

Advent Ascension Rites.name: Ascension Rites

Advent Reanimation.description: Allows the renewed Unity to create a temporary clone of destroyed enemy frigates, cruisers, or corvettes where they were defeated.
Advent Reanimation.name: Reanimation

Advent Commerce Integration.description: The Advent rely on telepathic coordination and the distribution of mental focus within the Unity to organize their economy. Adjusting this model to function on newly conquered worlds still populated by telepathically silent citizens requires partial integration of commerce into the Advent concept of value.
Advent Commerce Integration.name: Commerce Integration

Advent Commerce Adaptation.description: Many of the countless new minds joining the Unity are deeply familar with the concept of commerce and eager to share their ideas for how to better adapt the Advent economy towards effective distribution of resources.
Advent Commerce Adaptation.name: Commerce Adaptation

Advent Commerce Acceptance.description: A deeper understanding of the motivation behind commerce allows the Unity to shape and guide economic exchange to benefit Advent society above all else.

Advent Forewarning.description: Frightening visions of the future warn scryers of incoming enemy ships during their phase jump to any planet you have established dominant culture.

Advent Acute Premonitions.description: Scryers become more sensitive to the intrusion of hostile forces, allowing incoming enemies to be seen two phase jumps away from any planet you have established dominant culture.

exotic_factory_modifiers: Decreases Andvar Ship Build Time by 30%

Advent Clarity of Purpose.description: Righteous purpose suffuses the Unity, driving the crews of it's warships to ever greater feats of psionic might.

Advent Shield of Faith.description: Makes your culture more resistant to being pushed back by that of another empire.

Advent Soul Reclamation.description: The souls of crews of destroyed units return to the Unity, replenishing a large amount of Focus each time.

Advent Antimatter Multicasting.description: Increases the antimatter restored by the Temple of Renewal structure.

Advent Unity Awakened.description: Grants increased Focus and Focus Restore Rate.

Advent Collective Focus.description: Grants increased Focus and Focus Restore Rate.

Advent Singular Resolve.description: Grants increased Focus and Focus Restore Rate.
Advent Singular Resolve.name: Singular Resolve

Vasari Improved Regeneration Bay.name: Improved Regeneration Bay

Vasari Shock and Awe.description: The populace is subjected to new propaganda campaigns that instill greater awe and fear of your capital ships.
Vasari Shock and Awe.name: Shock and Awe

Vasari Berserker Overcharge.description: Grants the Berserker Overcharge ability to Vulrak Penetrators, allowing them to gain increased damage and movement when dealing damage.
Vasari Berserker Overcharge.name: Berserker Overcharge

Vasari Quarnium Forging.description: Makes it possible to forge Quarnium exotics from the exotic refinery.
Vasari Quarnium Forging.name: Quarnium Forging

Vasari Debris Reclamation.description: Grants the Debris Reclamation ability to Jusotra Fabricator cruisers allowing them to salvage resources when enemies are destroyed.
Vasari Debris Reclamation.name: Debris Reclamation

Vasari Mobile Retrofit.description: Allows ships in the same gravity well to build items with no build time penalties.
Vasari Mobile Retrofit.name: Mobile Retrofit

Vasari Gas Giant Occupation.description: Allows occupation of Gas Giant planets.
Vasari Gas Giant Occupation.name: Gas Giant Occupation

weapon_modifiers: Increases Wave Weapon Tracking Speed by 200%
Vasari Heavy Turret Servos.description: Increases the tracking speed and effective range of Wave weapons.
Vasari Heavy Turret Servos.name: Heavy Turret Servos

Vasari Long Range Jumps.description: Phase drive maintenance and restoration efforts allow ships to phase jump to distant star systems.
Vasari Long Range Jumps.name: Long Range Jumps

Vasari Phase Missile Charging.description: Grants the Charged Phase Missile ability to Kanrak Assailants, allowing them to fire a high speed missile with greatly enhanced shield bypass chance.
Vasari Phase Missile Charging.name: Phase Missile Charging

Vasari Vorastra Rulership.description: Your rulers relocate to your Titan, preventing you from being defeated so long as your Titan or Capital planet remain intact.
Vasari Vorastra Rulership.name: Vorastra Rulership

Vasari Mobile Phase Detection.description: Grants the Mobile Phase Detection ability to Serevun Overseers, allowing them to detect enemy ships heading towards the gravity well the cruiser occupies.
Vasari Mobile Phase Detection.name: Mobile Phase Detection

Vasari Phase Gate Unlock.description: Creates a Phase Gate which allows your empire's ships to travel directly between this planet and any other Phase Gate in the star system.
Vasari Phase Gate Unlock.name: Phase Gate Unlock

Vasari Phase Jump Inhibitor Unlock.description: During the initial Empire expansion, the Vasari found these devices scattered about the galaxy, even in areas with no evidence of settlement. Unable to determine why they work but successfully replicated using nanotechnology, they were employed throughout the Empire as part of the Vasari's extensive subject containment programs. Over thousands of years the mystery eventually faded into commonality. Once unlocked, this powerful structure blocks enemy ships from phase jumping away from the local gravity well.
Vasari Phase Jump Inhibitor Unlock.name: Phase Jump Inhibitor Unlock

Vasari Phase Space Monitoring.description: Allows incoming enemy ships to be detected as they phase jump towards your empire's planets.
Vasari Phase Space Monitoring.name: Phase Space Monitoring

weapon_modifiers: Increases Point Defense Weapon Tracking Speed by 20%
Increases Point Defense Weapon Range by 15%
Vasari Precise Turret Servos.description: Increases the tracking speed and effective range of Point Defense weapons.
Vasari Precise Turret Servos.name: Precise Turret Servos

Vasari Orbital Extraction.description: Extractors augment planetary mining by gathering resources from available asteroids.
Vasari Orbital Extraction.name: Orbital Extraction

Vasari Wormhole Stabilization.description: Improved phase field projection technology allows ships to safely traverse through Wormholes.
Vasari Wormhole Stabilization.name: Wormhole Stabilization

Vasari Jump Inhibition Immunity.description: Makes Jikara Navigators ignore the effect of Phase Jump Inhibitors.
Vasari Jump Inhibition Immunity.name: Jump Inhibition Immunity

Vasari Interracial Forum.description: Improved relations open a political dimension to the cooperation strategy fostering further exchange in ideas and more investment into facilities for the exchange of goods.
Vasari Interracial Forum.name: Interracial Forum

Vasari Interracial District.description: Entire districts are developed around Exchanges to welcome and house increasing members of the growing coalition maximizing the exchange of ideas and goods.
Vasari Interracial District.name: Interracial District

Vasari Beam Streaming.description: Increases the damage of all Beam weapons.
Vasari Beam Streaming.name: Beam Streaming

Vasari Intense Beams.description: Further increases the damage of all Beam weapons.
Vasari Intense Beams.name: Intense Beams

Vasari Acute Beams.description: Further increases the damage of all Beam weapons.
Vasari Acute Beams.name: Acute Beams

Vasari Exponential Beams.description: Further increases the damage of all Beam weapons.
Vasari Exponential Beams.name: Exponential Beams

Vasari Stabilization Nanites.description: Specialized nanites are evolved to locate and stabilize potential fault lines in the delicate environments of Crystalline worlds, allowing large settlements to be established around the most precious crystal nodes.
Vasari Stabilization Nanites.name: Stabilization Nanites

Vasari Localized Phasing.description: The unusually abundant resources of Crystalline worlds are used to power small scale phase shifting devices, allowing local populations to improve their research efforts and survive attack more effectively.
Vasari Localized Phasing.name: Localized Phasing

planet_modifiers: Increases Desert Planet Max Population by 12%
Vasari Anhydrobiosis.description: Genetic alteration granting the ability to survive extreme desiccation is imposed on all Desert planet inhabitants.
Vasari Anhydrobiosis.name: Anhydrobiosis

Vasari Hygroscopic Nanites.description: Specialized nanites bred to aggressively locate and reclaim water are deployed in arid environments, preventing wastage and allowing mining operations to be established in the deep desert.
Vasari Hygroscopic Nanites.name: Hygroscopic Nanites

Vasari Vask Tacticians.description: Largely responsible for the most effective Vasari assaults, the Vask wing deploys specialist teams to flagships on critical fronts for advanced training.
Vasari Vask Tacticians.name: Vask Tacticians

Vasari Improved Debris Reclamation.description: Improves the Debris Reclamation ability on Jusotra Fabricator cruisers, more resources will be salvaged when enemies are destroyed.
Vasari Improved Debris Reclamation.name: Improved Debris Reclamation

planet_modifiers: Increases Ferrous Planet Max Population by 24%
Vasari Metabolic Reclamation.description: Inhabitants are genetically modified to adapt their metabolisms to survive more easily in non-organic environments, allowing advanced development of Ferrous planets.
Vasari Metabolic Reclamation.name: Metabolic Reclamation

planet_modifiers: Increases Ferrous Planet Max Population by 30%
Vasari Ferric Transformation.description: Organic life is introduced in an effort to begin the long process of terraforming the planet making the environment slightly less hostile.
Vasari Ferric Transformation.name: Ferric Transformation

Vasari Atomic Engineering.description: Improvements in molecular-scale construction techniques produce hull materials with fewer flaws, increasing armor points, acceleration and turn speed.
Vasari Atomic Engineering.name: Atomic Engineering

Vasari Flawless Armor.description: Perfection of nano-engineering results in perfectly constructed materials, resulting in increased armor points, acceleration and turn speed.
Vasari Flawless Armor.name: Flawless Armor

Vasari Atomic Lattice Armor.description: Armor is switched to a molecular lattice design, greatly increasing its strength.
Vasari Atomic Lattice Armor.name: Atomic Lattice Armor

unit_modifiers: Increases Hull Regeneration In Combat by 1.2
Vasari Reinforced Nanite Conduits.description: Internal nanite distribution conduits are reinforced to withstand damage, enabling Vasari ships to constantly repair hull points during combat.
Vasari Reinforced Nanite Conduits.name: Reinforced Nanite Conduits

Vasari Skeletal Reinforcement.description: The core superstructure of all ships and structures is fortified, increasing maximum hull points.
Vasari Skeletal Reinforcement.name: Skeletal Reinforcement

Vasari Nano Hull Plating.description: New micro-organization of hull plating material more effectively disperses damage forces, further increasing maximum hull points.
Vasari Nano Hull Plating.name: Nano Hull Plating

Vasari Adaptive Bulkheads.description: Internal bulkheads are dynamically fortified with nano materials to mitigate damage, further increasing maximum hull points.
Vasari Adaptive Bulkheads.name: Adaptive Bulkheads

Vasari Reintegration.description: Damaged hull sections are automatically reclaimed and added to raw material reserves for use in repair, increasing hull regeneration rate.
Vasari Reintegration.name: Reintegration

Vasari Regenerative Hulls.description: Hull sub-structures are engineered with dispersed nanite repair nodes, further increasing hull regeneration rate.
Vasari Regenerative Hulls.name: Regenerative Hulls

Vasari Self-Repairing Systems.description: Nanite auto-repair systems are pervasively upgraded to repair advanced ship systems, greatly increasing the hull regeneration rate.
Vasari Self-Repairing Systems.name: Self-Repairing Systems

Vasari Armor Restoration.description: Cooperation with TEC supply chains resolve a materials shortage, allowing Vasari warships to be built to original, more durable specifications, greatly increasing armor and hull points.
Vasari Armor Restoration.name: Armor Restoration

unit_modifiers: Decreases Phase Jump Charge Time by 24%
Vasari Optimized Phase Drives.description: Phase drives minimum operational thresholds are improved, allowing ships to initiate a phase jump much faster.
Vasari Optimized Phase Drives.name: Optimized Phase Drives

planet_modifiers: Increases Ice Planet Max Population by 12%
Vasari Thermogenesis.description: Genetic modification to promote genes that generate internal heat and maintain a warmer body temperature is imposed on all inhabitants of Ice planets.
Vasari Thermogenesis.name: Thermogenesis

planet_modifiers: Increases Ice Planet Max Population by 18%
Vasari Cold-Shock Proteins.description: Genetic modification to promote genes that protect cellular structures and membranes from cold-induced stress is imposed on all inhabitants of Ice planets.
Vasari Cold-Shock Proteins.name: Cold-Shock Proteins

Vasari Emissary Outreach.description: Representatives of the Vasari Empire are dispatched beyond occupied territories to establish contact with exploitable minor factions.
Vasari Emissary Outreach.name: Emissary Outreach

Vasari Ambassador Relations.description: Vasari ambassadors are trained to exploit disagreements between lesser powers and manipulate minor factions into doing the Empire's bidding.
Vasari Ambassador Relations.name: Ambassador Relations

Vasari Communal Oppression.description: Labor Camp populations are expanded and community-wide oppression techniques are developed to control them.
Vasari Communal Oppression.name: Communal Oppression

Vasari Full Lockdown.description: As Labor Camps are further enlarged, oppression techniques are further enhanced to ensure physical and psychological control.
Vasari Full Lockdown.name: Full Lockdown

weapon_modifiers: Increases Phase Missile Weapon Damage by 12%
Vasari NME Warheads.description: Nano-Molecularly Engineered explosives deliver far more explosive force for a given mass, yielding greatly increased damage for all Phase Missile weapons.
Vasari NME Warheads.name: NME Warheads

weapon_modifiers: Increases Phase Missile Weapon Damage by 12%
Vasari Advanced NME Warheads.name: Advanced NME Warheads

weapon_modifiers: Increases Phase Missile Weapon Damage by 12%
Vasari Superior NME Warheads.name: Superior NME Warheads

npc_modifiers: Decreases Minor Faction Ability Cooldown by 18%
Vasari Coercive Control.description: Direct and indirect methods strongly encourage the Minor Factions to recognize that their interests are best served by more fully cooperating with your growing Empire. Reduces cooldown of their abilities.
Vasari Coercive Control.name: Coercive Control

planet_modifiers: Increases Oceanic Planet Max Population by 12%
Vasari Self Constructing Domes.description: High pressure bred nanites are deployed to the ocean floor to construct a variety of specialized domes allowing further development of Oceanic Planets.
Vasari Self Constructing Domes.name: Self Constructing Domes

Vasari Nano Algae Reactors.description: Reactors with specialized nanites evolved to support algae growth are deployed to all major population centers. While not popular as a food source, it does sustain a much larger mining workforce.
Vasari Nano Algae Reactors.name: Nano Algae Reactors

Vasari Administrative Specialists.description: With a protracted war the Vasari recognize the need to further specialize their administrators for surface-to-orbit control further increasing civilian orbit slots and extraction rates.
Vasari Administrative Specialists.name: Administrative Specialists

Vasari Improved Orbital Extraction.description: Improves the income rate from Metal and Crystal Extractors.
Vasari Improved Orbital Extraction.name: Improved Orbital Extraction

Vasari Advanced Orbital Extraction.description: Further improves the income rate from Metal and Crystal Extractors.
Vasari Advanced Orbital Extraction.name: Advanced Orbital Extraction

Vasari Superior Orbital Extraction.description: Further improves the income rate from Metal and Crystal Extractors.
Vasari Superior Orbital Extraction.name: Superior Orbital Extraction

Vasari Improved Phase Detection.description: Improves the Mobile Phase Detection ability on Serevun Overseers, allowing them to detect enemy ships two jumps away.
Vasari Improved Phase Detection.name: Improved Phase Detection

weapon_modifiers: Increases Phase Missile Bypass Shields Chance by 0.2
Vasari Phase Missile Predictors.description: Improved onboard predictors increase the chance phase missiles will bypass shields by estimating the optimal time to phase out.
Vasari Phase Missile Predictors.name: Phase Missile Predictors

Vasari Phasic Strike.description: Anticipating the likely chance of combat upon arrival, risky modifications to the Resonance harnessing systems are made to prolong Resonance effects.
Vasari Phasic Strike.name: Phasic Strike

Vasari Resonance Mastery.description: Radical improvements allow for onboard systems to improve Resonance in the ship's immediate vicinity, prolonging their effects
Vasari Resonance Mastery.name: Resonance Mastery

Vasari Pinpoint Bombardment.description: Increases the range from which ships can assault planets.
Vasari Pinpoint Bombardment.name: Pinpoint Bombardment

Vasari Artificial Longevity.description: Extensive use of nanomachines in health care increases the rate of population growth on your empire's planets.
Vasari Artificial Longevity.name: Artificial Longevity

Vasari Improved Pulse Concentrators.description: Increases the damage of all Pulse Gun weapons.
Vasari Improved Pulse Concentrators.name: Improved Pulse Concentrators

Vasari Rapid Pulse Cycling.description: Increases the damage of all Pulse Gun weapons.
Vasari Rapid Pulse Cycling.name: Rapid Pulse Cycling

Vasari Enhanced Pulse Emission.description: Further increases the damage of all Pulse Gun weapons.
Vasari Enhanced Pulse Emission.name: Enhanced Pulse Emission

Vasari Energetic Pulse Charging.description: Maximizes the damage of all Pulse weapons.
Vasari Energetic Pulse Charging.name: Energetic Pulse Charging

Vasari Bifurcative Shielding.description: Shields are adjusted to generate intersecting energy fields, increasing shield points and regeneration rate.
Vasari Bifurcative Shielding.name: Bifurcative Shielding

Vasari Multi-Pass Shield Arrays.description: Shields are augmented with additional layers of energy, further increasing shield points and regeneration rate.
Vasari Multi-Pass Shield Arrays.name: Multi-Pass Shield Arrays

unit_modifiers: Increases Shield Regeneration In Combat by 0.6
Vasari Regenerative Shielding.description: Composite generator matrices allow shields to be continually refreshed, enabling shield point regeneration even when the ship is under attack.
Vasari Regenerative Shielding.name: Regenerative Shielding

Vasari Reverse Engineered Shields.description: Despite many technological advantages, Vasari shields are still inferior to the Advent specialty. As a reluctant goodwill gesture, Advent technology is donated for reverse engineering, enabling shield burst for Vasari ships. Shield burst will interfere with Regenerative Shielding while charging.
Vasari Reverse Engineered Shields.name: Reverse Engineered Shields

Vasari Orkulus Advanced Engines.description: Advances in engine technology allows Orkulus Starbases to move faster.
Vasari Orkulus Advanced Engines.name: Orkulus Advanced Engines

planet_modifiers: Decreases Orbital Structure Build Time by 36%
Vasari Molecular Assembly.description: Improved construction nanites reduce the time required to build orbital structures.
Vasari Molecular Assembly.name: Molecular Assembly

planet_modifiers: Increases Primordial Planet Max Population by 12%
Vasari Genetic Cataloging.description: Large scale genetic analysis is conducted to identify useful adaptations and dangerous pathogens alike, allowing further development of Primordial planets.
Vasari Genetic Cataloging.name: Genetic Cataloging

planet_modifiers: Increases Primordial Planet Max Population by 18%
Vasari Hyperimmunity.description: Genetic modification to promote immune cell production and response rate is imposed on all inhabitants of Primordial planets, allowing mining operations in dense organic environments.
Vasari Hyperimmunity.name: Hyperimmunity

planet_modifiers: Increases Terran Planet Max Population by 12%
Vasari Civic Repurposing.description: The pre-existing populations of Terran worlds are provided with significant incentives to adapt their cities and infrastructure towards resource extraction instead of more frivolous and wasteful activities.
Vasari Civic Repurposing.name: Civic Repurposing

planet_modifiers: Increases Terran Planet Max Percentage Allied Population by 24%
Vasari Compliance Nanites.description: A unique, advanced strain of nanites is bred for use in suppressing the most unruly inhabitants of Terran worlds, transforming them from drains on occupation society into highly productive miners.
Vasari Compliance Nanites.name: Compliance Nanites

planet_modifiers: Increases Volcanic Planet Max Population by 24%
Vasari Heat Shock Proteins.description: Genetic modification to promote genes that protect cellular structures and membranes from heat-induced stress and maintain proper protein folding is imposed on all inhabitants of Volcanic planets.
Vasari Heat Shock Proteins.name: Heat Shock Proteins

planet_modifiers: Increases Volcanic Planet Max Population by 30%
Vasari Extreme Heat Metabolism.description: Basic metabolic processes of all inhabitants are re-engineered to catalyze at the extreme temperatures on Volcanic planets.
Vasari Extreme Heat Metabolism.name: Extreme Heat Metabolism

planet_modifiers: Increases Volcanic Planet Max Population by 36%
Vasari Sulfurous Respiration.description: Genetic alteration granting the ability to breathe normally toxic atmospheric gases is imposed on all inhabitants of Volcanic planets.
Vasari Sulfurous Respiration.name: Sulfurous Respiration

Vasari Wave Densification.description: The wave packets are concentrated into a denser form increasing the damage of all Wave weapons.
Vasari Wave Densification.name: Wave Densification

Vasari Wave Amplification.description: The wave packets are further amplified increasing the damage of all Wave weapons.
Vasari Wave Amplification.name: Wave Amplification

Vasari Neutral Wave Channels.description: By isolating wave channels to outside effects, wave packets are launched in a much more pure form further increasing the damage of all Wave weapons.
Vasari Neutral Wave Channels.name: Neutral Wave Channels

Vasari Energized Wave Charging.description: Research into pulse charging pays further dividends by transferring much of the same theory to Wave weapons maximizing their damage.
Vasari Energized Wave Charging.name: Energized Wave Charging
